alert.note: Alert for Davis; Wapello (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 24 at 6:01PM CDT until June 24 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN WAPELLO AND NORTHEASTERN DAVIS COUNTIES... At 600 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Eldon, or 11 miles northeast of Bloomfield, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Public. At 557 PM, quarter sized hail was reported southeast of Eldon. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Wapello and northeastern Davis Counties, including the following locations... Eldon. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for southeastern Iowa. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
